sn33.51-54:4.2: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn33.51-54:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn33.51-54:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn33.51-54:4.6: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33.51-54:4.8: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti?
sn33.51-54:4.9: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, appaccakkhakammā, rūpasamudaye appaccakkhakammā, rūpanirodhe appaccakkhakammā, rūpanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya appaccakkhakammā … pe ….
